Question.Subject: Why is nicktropolis.com so slow today?
Question.Content:
I dont know why but today (2/26/2010/) I made a nicktropolis and Me and friend decided to go on together and it took a hour to load...I was wondering if the site was in problems or anything...It wasnt just my computer....it also happened to my friend, and my moms computer I cant get on and I dont know how to get on nicktropolis...It would be so nice if someone can answer it..
Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
2 theories.
1- if it has been just created, you may need to reboot the computer (Restart it)
2- Nicktropolis might be undergoing Technical difficulties or under maintenance.
Good luck!

Answer.Content:
2 theories.
1- if it has been just created, you may need to reboot the computer (Restart it)
2- Nicktropolis might be undergoing Technical difficulties or under maintenance.
Good luck!
Answer.Reference: ive had slow computer problems with games before.
